document_data.mainbody:
Endugous Than was a wizard and member of the Zhentarim during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He stood  tall.
Endugous was a cunning man whose ambitions carried him toward gathering more power.
Circa 1369 DR, Endugous was stationed in Snowmantle near the Border Forest where he served under Ragnoth.
He carried a quarterstaff and wore a pair of bracers of defense.
He could cast the following spells magic missile, charm person, phantasmal force, sleep, alter self, Melfs acid arrow, fly, and hold person.
